titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey to Miami- Dade County certain federally owned land in Florida, and for other purposes.
To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey to Miami- Dade County certain federally owned land in Florida, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, and Nutrition.

bill.summary:
Directs the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA) to convey to Miami-Dade County, Florida, federally owned land comprising the Subtropical Horticulture Research Station in Miami-Dade County, Florida.
Directs the County to pay specified costs.
